title: About loot
body: Hello guys i was told that after level 6 when i unlock loot  i would recieve a two hextech chests. Okay but recieved only one when will a recieve the second one ? level 11 atm

replies.body: Weeeeeiiiiiird. Every once and awhile those chests can take a little bit before they get added to accounts. Do me a favor and check for that new player chest again!
